item.title: CBRM: New Server/New URL
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: I've sucessfully moved Comic Book Review Machine over to my server in our new house and the website now has a URL all to its own! (http://www.comicbookreviewmachine.com/) We just reached 800 reviews in our review database, why don't you pop on over and check some of them out?
